Telling the story in non-technical terms is critical to @briankrebs success. Getting his hands dirty is part of understanding story. #csxna
.@briankrebs sharing stories of being hacked bc of his work, incl Paypal hack, spoofed email about hostage situation @ his house etc #csxna
#authentication is going to be the most serious & difficult cyber problem for this generation and the next. -@briankrebs #csxna
Extortion-based DDOS attacks will become more prevalent, esp with IoT. @briankrebs sharing his DDOS exp, hard to find protection. #csxna
ransomware attacks will become more strategic with targets & understand what the data is worth to yield higher ransoms. -@briankrebs #csxna
#2: Mind shift of ransomware attacks. No longer intrinsic value of data but how that says can be ransomed for more than its worth. #csxna
.@briankrebs predictions on increasing threats: #1 account takeovers. Will become worse, esp with botnets. #csxna
.@briankrebs thinks small & med sized biz will start outsourcing cyber more as they find out how $$ & hard good cyber can be #csxna
.@briankrebs keynote touch on #identity & #authentication in his #csxna keynote
